statements: SELECT * FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques WHERE technique_category = 'Powerlifting';
SELECT technique_name, technique_category FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques ORDER BY technique_name DESC;
SELECT technique_name, technique_description FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques WHERE technique_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques ORDER BY technique_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT technique_name, technique_description, technique_category FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques WHERE technique_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT * FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques ORDER BY technique_name DESC, technique_id ASC;
SELECT technique_name, technique_category FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques WHERE technique_category='Powerlifting';
SELECT technique_name FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques WHERE technique_description LIKE '%Olympic%';
SELECT technique_id, technique_name FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques WHERE technique_category='CrossFit' ORDER BY technique_id DESC;
SELECT technique_name, LENGTH(technique_description) AS description_length FROM approved_weightlifting_techniques WHERE LENGTH(technique_description) > 100 ORDER BY description_length DESC
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT guideline_name, content FROM weightlifting_guidelines WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques ORDER BY approved_date DESC;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM approved_techniques WHERE approved_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_name = 'Squat' AND approved_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT technique_name, approved_date FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_name LIKE '%press%' ORDER BY approved_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM weightlifting_guidelines WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY guideline_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_guidelines FROM weightlifting_guidelines;
SELECT guideline_name, content FROM weightlifting_guidelines WHERE content ILIKE '%correct form%' AND LENGTH(content) > 100;
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques;
SELECT technique_name, technique_description FROM approved_techniques;
SELECT guideline_title, guideline_details FROM guidelines ORDER BY guideline_id DESC;
SELECT rule_description FROM rules WHERE rule_penalty = 'Fine';
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT technique_name, technique_description FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM guidelines ORDER BY guideline_title DESC;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_title, guideline_details FROM guidelines WHERE guideline_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT rule_id, rule_description FROM rules WHERE rule_penalty <> 'None';
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques;
SELECT technique_name, category FROM approved_techniques ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT guide_title, content FROM guidelines WHERE guide_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM rules WHERE rule_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques WHERE category = 'Category A';
SELECT technique_name, description FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT users.username, approved_techniques.technique_name FROM users INNER JOIN approved_techniques ON users.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM guidelines ORDER BY guide_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, rules.rule_name FROM users, rules WHERE users.username = 'John';
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques;
SELECT technique_name, technique_description FROM approved_techniques WHERE technique_name = 'Example Technique';
SELECT * FROM guidelines ORDER BY guideline_title DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country FROM athletes WHERE athlete_country = 'USA' ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competitions WHERE winner_id = 1 AND competition_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM approved_techniques;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country, athlete_weight FROM athletes WHERE technique_id = 1 ORDER BY athlete_weight DESC;
SELECT competition_name, competition_location, competition_date FROM competitions WHERE competition_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT guideline_title, guideline_description, technique_name FROM guidelines INNER JOIN approved_techniques ON guidelines.technique_id = approved_techniques.technique_id;

SELECT athlete_name, record_title, competition_name FROM athletes INNER JOIN records ON athletes.athlete_id = records.athlete_id INNER JOIN competitions ON records.athlete_id = competitions.winner_id;
